Title: I Am Smitten With This Super-Thin Foldable You Can’t Buy in the U.S.
Description:
The Oppo Find N5 is a good look at what's to come from foldable smartphone design.
Here's hoping better cameras are on the horizon.

Title: 60 years after Bloody Sunday in Alabama, elusive racial progress in Selma
Description:
Events in Selma, Ala.
six decades ago helped win support for the 1965 Voting Rights Act.
Today local activists say they're still fighting stubborn segregation, poverty and gun violence.

Title: This Women's History Month, readers tell NPR about the women who changed their lives
Description:
Since 1995, presidents have issued a series of proclamations celebrating Women's History in March.
NPR readers share stories of the women who have made the biggest impacts on their lives.

Title: The résumé a software engineer used to land a cybersecurity job at Microsoft
Description: 36-year-old Ankit Masrani worked as a software engineer at AWS before landing a security job at Microsoft.

Title: Trying the buzzy social media platform Yope showed me how hard it is to get people to download another app
Description:
With 2.2 million monthly active listeners, Yope is gaining traction with Gen Z users.
I tested it for a few days to see the appeal.

Title: America's aging population faces a growing shortage of geriatric care
Description:
For a variety of reasons, geriatric care experts told BI it's been hard attracting new doctors to the field.
It's a problem for an aging US population.

Title: I paid $41,500 to build an ADU office in my backyard. It's allowed us to keep living comfortably in a smaller home.
Description:
Justin Mauldin said he's more productive in his serene backyard tiny-home office.
His real-estate agent also told him it increased his property value.

Title: People Are Always Shocked by Who My Best Friend Is. But We Have Something Undeniably Special.
Description: Maybe we’re drawn to friends who match our internal age more than our external one.

Title: A look at his coaching roots from Marty to 'BYA' to Spurrier
Description: Schottenheimer's first head coaching gig is with the Cowboys, but his coaching style began as a QB in high school.

Title: 10 years ago today, Apple launched a revolutionary MacBook that failed spectacularly
Description:
The 12-inch MacBook turns 10 years old today.
It embodied Apple’s best and worst impulses before being unceremoniously ditched a few years later.
What happened?

Title: 35 years after its release, Joe Versus the Volcano remains one of the most underrated romantic comedies
Description:
Joe Versus the Volcano, a masterful but underrated rom-com that marked the first screen pairing of Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan, was released 35 years ago today.
Here's why it's still worth watching.

Title: Trump’s Agenda Is Undermining American Science
Description:
America has been first in scientific progress, Dhruv Khullar writes.
But Trump is upending the long-standing bipartisan consensus that the government should fund scientific research and then mostly stay out of the way.
